forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 60F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
